caption: Algorithm 1 Modifying ERM to Yield Log-Loss Guarantees
description: This algorithm modifies the Empirical Risk Minimization (ERM) to achieve guarantees on both the log-loss and the validity of the generated model. It does so by mixing the ERM output with a uniform distribution, with the mixing weight determined by the desired levels of suboptimality in loss (€1) and invalidity (€2).  The algorithm uses no validity queries.
